about_the_game:
Collect cards, build decks, and battle fierce opponents in Top Check, a chess inspired rogue-like deck builder and collectable card game.  Clash with adversaries online using your favorite constructed deck.  Or demonstrate your deck building prowess in the rogue-like Challenge Run game mode.  With a plethora of new pieces and unique abilities, only the best strategists will emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

Features

  • Rich tactical combat

  • Constructed deckbuilding

  • A tutorial to guide you as a new player

  • An 1v1 AI Battle mode to test new decks

  • Online PvP with MMR-based matchmaking

  • A dedicated rogue-like game mode with deckbuilding

  • Tons of new pieces and unique abilities

  • Cosmetic options to personalize your in-game experience
